resources.name: Item history
resources.description:
Get the purchase history of a given item

<!-- RESPONSE -->
{
	"listUuid": "15413b50-5f62-4abb-b699-6fa899aabc9b",
	"itemId": "savon",
	"action": "PURCHASE",
	"publicUserUuid": "31d32863-59f6-42c0-923d-7e7185e015aa",
	"dateTimeUtc": "2023-04-29T09:54:02.542Z"
}
<!-- ENDRESPONSE -->

resources.name: bring-api.git
resources.description:
Unofficial API documentation for Bring! shopping app: https://www.getbring.com/

This documentation is not endorsed by Bring! developers and is subject to changes without notification

Insomnia workspace: https://github.com/Psychokiller1888/bring-api

Python API based on this: https://github.com/Psychokiller1888/bring-api/tree/python-api

resources.name: Item details
resources.description:
Get an item' details

<!-- RESPONSE -->
{
	"uuid": "29287d40-ade1-4dd3-ad1d-8f4cf9a6c676",
	"itemId": "Aufschnit",
	"listUuid": "15413b50-5f62-4abb-b699",
	"userIconItemId": "",
	"userSectionId": "",
	"assignedTo": "",
	"imageUrl": ""
}
<!-- ENDRESPONSE -->

resources.name: Change item category
resources.description:
Move an item into a different category.

```
WARNING
Be very carefull not to send an item in an unexisting category, or you'll break your app!!!
```

One way to find the available category names is to GET User settings, your categories will be listed in your user settings.

```
GOOD TO KNOW
Your custom category is called "Eigene Artikel"
```

<!-- RESPONSE -->
On success `204` status code is returned
<!-- ENDRESPONSE -->

resources.name: Change item icon
resources.description:
Change an item' icon by another existing one

<!-- RESPONSE -->
On success `204` status code is returned
<!-- ENDRESPONSE -->

resources.name: Get ads
User settings
Recaptcha
Magic link
resources.description:
If you don't login with a password, on a web page, you can ask for a magic link to be sent

<!-- RESPONSE -->
Status code `200`
<!-- ENDRESPONSE -->

resources.name: Check email
resources.description:
Checks if the provided email is valid and a user exists with it

<!-- RESPONSE -->
{
	"emailValid": true,
	"userExists": true
}
<!-- ENDRESPONSE -->

resources.name: Auth
resources.description:
Send a login request in order to get your auth token

<!-- RESPONSE -->
{
	"uuid": "5331ea7",
	"publicUuid": "31d32863",
	"email": "foo@bar.ch",
	"name": "Psycho",
	"photoPath": "bring\/user\/portrait\/9b7f1c4",
	"bringListUUID": "15413b5",
	"access_token": "XXXX",
	"refresh_token": "XXXX",
	"token_type": "Bearer",
	"expires_in": 604799
}
<!-- ENDRESPONSE -->

resources.name: Get list

params.name: uuid
params.description: list id to add or remove to

params.name: recently
params.description: item to add to recent items

resources.name: Get list users
resources.description:
Gets the assigned users to a specific list

<!-- RESPONSE -->
{
	"users": [
		{
			"publicUuid": "31d32015aa",
			"name": "Psycho",
			"email": "foo@bar.ch",
			"photoPath": "bring\/user\/portrait\/9b7fbd6",
			"pushEnabled": true,
			"plusTryOut": false,
			"country": "CH",
			"language": "en"
		}
	]
}
<!-- ENDRESPONSE -->

resources.name: User data
resources.description:
Retrieves user data

<!-- RESPONSE -->
{
	"userUuid": "5331e09b25",
	"publicUserUuid": "31d325aa",
	"email": "foo@bar.ch",
	"emailVerified": true,
	"name": "Psycho",
	"photoPath": "bring/user/portrait/9b7f1c2bd6",
	"userLocale": {
		"language": "en",
		"country": "CH"
	},
	"premiumConfiguration": {
		"hasPremium": false,
		"hideSponsoredProducts": false,
		"hideSponsoredTemplates": false,
		"hideSponsoredPosts": false,
		"hideSponsoredCategories": false,
		"hideOffersOnMain": false
	}
}
<!-- ENDRESPONSE -->
